name: Tokyo
environmental_problem: Air pollution from vehicle emissions and industrial activities, leading to respiratory diseases and acid rain
environmental_solution: Implement electric vehicle incentives, expand public transportation, and establish green building standards with rooftop gardens

name: Delhi
environmental_problem: Severe air pollution with PM2.5 levels exceeding WHO standards by 10x, causing health crises
environmental_solution: Implement odd-even vehicle schemes, promote CNG vehicles, establish air quality monitoring networks, and create urban forests

name: Shanghai
environmental_problem: Industrial water pollution affecting the Yangtze River and coastal waters, plus air quality issues
environmental_solution: Upgrade industrial wastewater treatment, implement green energy initiatives, and establish coastal protection zones

name: São Paulo
environmental_problem: Deforestation of Atlantic Forest, water scarcity, and urban heat island effects
environmental_solution: Restore native vegetation, implement rainwater harvesting systems, and create green corridors throughout the city

name: Mexico City
environmental_problem: Severe air pollution trapped by surrounding mountains, water scarcity, and ground subsidence
environmental_solution: Implement vehicle emission controls, promote water conservation, and establish sustainable urban planning policies

name: Cairo
environmental_problem: Nile River pollution from industrial and domestic waste, air pollution, and urban sprawl
environmental_solution: Upgrade sewage treatment facilities, implement waste management programs, and create green spaces along the Nile

name: Mumbai
environmental_problem: Coastal pollution, flooding from monsoons, and severe air quality issues
environmental_solution: Implement coastal protection measures, improve drainage systems, and establish air quality monitoring with pollution control measures

name: Beijing
environmental_problem: Severe air pollution from coal burning and industrial emissions, water scarcity
environmental_solution: Transition to renewable energy, implement strict emission standards, and establish water conservation programs
